mapper.select: select oa_process.*from oa_process inner join ( select max(f_version) as f_version,process_bid from oa_process where process_bid=#{processBid} and process_state in ('2','4') GROUP BY process_bid ) as processdata on processdata.process_bid=oa_process.process_bid and Oa_process.f_version=processdata.f_version

select oa_process.*from oa_process inner join ( select max(f_version) as f_version,process_bid from oa_process where processcode=#{processCode} and process_state in ('2','4') GROUP BY process_bid ) as processdata on processdata.process_bid=oa_process.process_bid and oa_process.f_version=processdata.f_version

select Oa_process.*from Oa_process inner join ( select max(f_version) as f_version,process_bid from Oa_process GROUP BY process_bid ) as processdata on processdata.process_bid=Oa_process.process_bid and Oa_process.f_version=processdata.f_version where process_State=2

select oa_processchart.flowdata, oa_process.oa_process_id, oa_process.process_state from oa_processchart inner join oa_process on oa_process.oa_process_id=oa_processchart.oa_process_id where oa_processchart.oa_process_id=#{processid}

select oa_process.*,proc.processtypename from oa_process inner join ( select max(f_version) as f_version,process_bid from oa_process where (process_State=2 or process_State=1 or process_State=3) GROUP BY process_bid ) as processdata on processdata.process_bid=oa_process.process_bid and oa_process.f_version=processdata.f_version inner join oa_processtype as proc on proc.processtypecode=oa_process.processtypecode
and processname like CONCAT('',#{processname},'%') and proc.processtypecode = #{processtypecode}
and processcode like CONCAT('',#{processcode},'%')
order by update_date desc

select oa_process.*,proc.processtypename from oa_process inner join oa_processtype as proc on proc.processtypecode=oa_process.processtypecode where (process_state=2 or process_state=1 or process_state=3) and processname like CONCAT('',#{processname},'%')
and proc.processtypecode = #{processtypecode} and processcode like CONCAT('',#{processcode},'%') and f_version = #{version} order by update_date desc
